what_you_do: Mark shares his models and experiences to make brand principles practical, relevant, and useful in day-to-day efforts. He writes about ideas to move people forward.
who_you_serve: Global healthcare companies, biotech leaders, hospital products companies, drug delivery system developers, medical start-ups, and major university tech transfer offices.
social_proof: Recipient of the Brand Leadership Award from the Asia Brand Congress for global marketing efforts. Included in the PharmaVoice 100 Most Inspiring People in the Life-Sciences Industry.
signature_programs: ForwardFast Branding and N-of-8 Groups books, contributor to Living in the Now and Alone In My Universe books.
business_focus: Provides branding, advertising, and marketing strategy services for healthcare, science, and technology companies.
